properties.shortDescription: Easily customize and deploy Quests to automate your community onboarding. A quest is a set of fully customizable tasks – from quizzes, to open contributions, to social validation (i.e.: Discord) – that personalize your onboarding strategy and turn it a journey to join your community.
properties.longDescription: Easily customize and deploy Quests to automate your community onboarding. A quest is a set of fully customizable tasks – from quizzes, to open contributions, to social validation (i.e.: Discord) – that personalize your onboarding strategy and turn it a journey to join your community.
properties.author: Āut Labs
properties.title: Quest
